extensionDescription.message: This Add-on shows a notification when have a new question on Support forum.

notify_involved.message: Alert me when there's an update in a question where I've been involved in before

description_questions.message: Determines whether the Sumo Live Helper should alert the receipt of new questions

frequency_questions.message: Determines the time interval at which the Sumo Live Helper should seek new questions

polling.message: Time in minutes to query the API
